document_data.name: Bay Town
document_data.mainbody: '''Bay Town''' was a small settlement found in [[Traders Bay]] in [[Impiltur]].
document_data.Geography: Bay Town sat on the southeastern shore of [[Bluefang Water]] near the [[Uplands]] of Impiltur.
document_data.Trade: Although centrally located on a major waterway, Bay Town never gained any economic prominence, and was largely overshadowed by ports on the coast of the [[Easting Reach]]. Instead, Bay Town catered only to the dregs of society.
document_data.Inhabitants:
As of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], Bay Town's population was 1,750.

Bay Town was a haven for thieves, pirates and a slew of other unfavorable types. Among the major thieves' guilds were the [[Silent Poniards]] and the [[Red Masks]].

Aware that these seedy types of citizens would always carve their niche somewhere, the [[Lords of Imphras II]] preferred to at least have them all in one spot, especially one like Bay Town which happened to be rather insignificant.{{Cite dragon/346/Impiltur: The Forgotten Kingdom}}

Visitors to Bay Town had to be wary lest they end up shackled into slavery.
